mapper.insert: insert into order_master (order_no, user_id, total_amount) values (#{order.orderNo}, #{order.userId}, #{order.totalAmount});
insert into order_detail (order_no, prod_no, qty, price) values (#{order.orderNo}, #{order.prodNo}, #{order.qty}, #{order.price})
mapper.select: with ranked_products as ( select a.order_no as order_no, a.order_date as order_date, c.prod_name as prod_name, row_number() over ( partition by a.order_no order by c.price desc, b.prod_no asc ) as rn from order_master as a inner join order_detail as b on a.order_no = b.order_no inner join product_master as c on b.prod_no = c.prod_no ) select order_no, order_date, prod_name from ranked_products where rn = 1;
